testsuite.name: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Then Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "Root Group Question"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: When I expand the "Text" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I click "Root Group Question" in the "Text" column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: Then I see that "Groups" header is not visible in the navigation column
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.name: And I see that "Root Group" Group is not visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups

testcase.classname: Scenario: Ensure that Root Group is not present in a Question's groups
